DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate effectiveness two method deliver information nutrition physical activity non-traditional college student . Participants receive either print feedback report alone , feedback report addition series phone call peer counselor . The peer counselor provide nutrition physical activity counsel use motivational interviewing technique . Nutrition physical activity outcomes measure group compare .
DOC.brief_title: Nutrition Physical Activity Counseling Nontraditional College Students
DOC.criteria: Currently enrol undergraduate student UMass Boston , Have complete high school , 24yrs old old AND/OR part time student , Noncompliant least 1 4 behavior : fruit & vegetable intake , sugar sweeten beverage intake , fast food intake , physical activity ) , Willing randomize either study group , Be able give inform consent . Have contraindication physical activity
